MS MCQs

    Set up functional locations in Asset Management for Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

    »

    1. When closing down a functional location, you set the functional lifecycle state to “Ended,” but you also want to automatically change the lifecycle state of the assets that are installed on that location to “Not in use.” What page and field do you use to automatically update the asset state?

      Lifecycle model

      Lifecycle state

      Lifecycle states selected


    2. (Fill in the blank) _______ are used to manage requirements for functional locations, including how assets are installed on a functional location.

      Functional lifecycle states

      Functional lifecycle models

      Functional location types


    3. Attribute types can be created for functional location types, assets, and ______ (fill in the blank).

      Work order scheduling

      Functional locations

      Maintenance requests

      Lifecycle states
